highlights: Developed a version management system for Tensorflow networks and datasets that facilitates a more intuitive way to train neural networks, resulting in **15% less downtime**.
Optimized end-to-end data flow, building cache services, creating database indices, and eliminating redundancies in object-relational mapping.
Improved codebase's Angular reactive form control infrastructure by decoupling validation logic from component logic via integration of custom rules engine.
Built internal data model parser to increase visibility into product performance and to facilitate automation of unit tests, **saving 200+ hours** of developer work.
Engineered robust, self-repairing test suite API, generating **20x testing coverage**; published for use across engineering team.
Leveraged life-cycle hooks and response caching in frontend overhaul, leading to **20% reduction** in inter-service latency and request runtime.

Instituted master-detail design pattern alongside auxiliary routes with Angular Router to transform bloated navigation into dynamic single-page application, providing template for future client projects.

Designed and implemented web-scraping robot workflows to fetch financial documents and metadata from banks and vendors for **5000+ clients**, navigating websites with 2FA, ReCaptchas, bot detection, etc.
Constructed new platform on company intranet to facilitate & simplify internal beta-testing of existing features for production web app.
Enhanced robot-success data visualization by integrating new metrics & improving performance breakdowns.
Spearheaded development of various automation tools aimed to greatly enhance workflow efficiency.
Bluetooth ad parser converts company's IoT device transmission into an easily readable format; **increased time efficiency of testing by 90%**.
Ad generator dynamically generates Bluetooth Low Energy packet using advertisement protocol.

projects.title: PillBox
highlights: Won sponsor prize for **Best Digital Health Hack** with web-app controlled automatic IoT pill dispensary system.
Dashboard enables users and caregivers to setup dosage, schedule, and text alerts for easy management of medication.
Architected entirety of jQuery-driven frontend and designed RESTful API for Python Flask backend.

projects.title: TrashTag-It
highlights: Developed Android app using Google Maps SDK to chart litter locations across local communities.
Won **first place in MLH**'s Best Use of SnapKit SDK and Transposit Framework prize categories.
Built JavaScript API endpoints for location services and Python Flask web server.

projects.title: Othello AI
highlights: Designed & developed a 1-player Othello game with 4-ply minimax, heuristic, and alpha-beta pruning algorithms for AI.
Implemented LED board and push buttons to facilitate more intuitive gameplay with legal move highlighting.
